bilingual.source: The joint capsule surrounds the joint, protecting it from injury.
bilingual.target: 关节囊包围着关节，保护它免受损伤。

bilingual.source: The joint capsule contains synovial fluid, which reduces joint friction.
bilingual.target: 关节囊内含有滑液，减少关节摩擦。

bilingual.source: During movement, the joint capsule helps maintain joint stability.
bilingual.target: 运动时，关节囊有助于维持关节的稳定性。
我的关节在下雨天会疼。

bilingual.source: He twisted his joint when he fell.

bilingual.target: 她的关节炎症需要治疗。

bilingual.source: Surgeons prefer intra-articular methods for certain joint surgeries.
bilingual.target: 外科医生在某些关节手术中更喜欢关节内的方法。

bilingual.source: He injured his elbow joint when he fell.
bilingual.target: 他摔倒时伤到了肘关节。

bilingual.source: He felt a sharp pain in his knee joint.
bilingual.target: 他感到膝盖关节一阵剧痛。

bilingual.source: You should move your joint before exercising.

list.abstract: 《JOINT》是日本歌手川田麻美演唱的歌曲。由川田麻美作词、中泽伴行作曲，收录在川田麻美2008年3月发行的专辑《SAVIA》中。
I've歌姬川田まみ（川田麻美）为大人气TV动画《灼眼的夏娜Second》 演唱的片头曲。作为川田麻美本人同《灼眼的夏娜》系列第三次合作的产物，《JOINT》依旧是由川田麻美本人填词，并再度请来善于将浓重的摇滚风与I've象征性的电子乐结合在一起的中泽伴行与尾崎武士参与制作，从而被业界评价“更好地将《夏娜》原本带有的魔幻氛围展现出来”，为《灼眼的夏娜Second》最先添上了大气磅礴的一笔。

yingyinNormal.en: You know I can't do that. That's me being nice. Now write. And it better match what I already know. By God, I'll take you apart joint by joint!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道的，我不能够那么做。这是对你客气的。 快写，最好和我已经掌握的消息相吻合，我要把你撕成碎片。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Smoked a joint, you know? Lit a bone. Weed, hemp, ganja.
Tusk is not gonna take any chances when the next Joint Commission talks come around.
yingyinNormal.zh: 商贸联委会谈判再度开启时，Tusk绝不会冒丝毫风险。

yingyinNormal.en: Your first joint interview, when your husband was running for state Assembly in '86.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们俩第一次共同接受采访，86年你丈夫竞选州议员时。

yingyinNormal.en: Not remotely.007, I'd like you to meet Max Denbigh, head of the Joint Security Service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，007，这位是麦克斯·邓比联合安全部主管。

yingyinNormal.en: Yo, yo, yo, where are the geniuses up in this joint? I need me some stimulates, stimulates.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呦呦呦，这个节骨眼上天才们都去哪儿了？我需要一点刺激，刺激！

yingyinNormal.en: I've contacted pretty much everyone except that medical marijuana store. You know, Joint Custody.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我联系了几乎所有人，除了药用大麻店的店主，就是"大麻[共同]监护权"。

yingyinNormal.en: Back at the ribs joint, I could just walk back in the kitchen when I got tired of hearing him talk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原来在餐馆，我听腻了就回厨房干活。

yingyinNormal.en: We're leading global efforts to address climate change including last month's joint announcement with China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们领导着全球解决气候变化问题的努力，包括上个月和中国所发表的联合宣言。

yingyinNormal.en: All this week, the Early Music Society of Pasadena is doing a joint concert with the San Gabriel Renaissance Choir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个礼拜帕萨迪纳市中世纪音乐社团要跟圣盖博市文艺复习合唱团联合举办音乐会。

yingyinNormal.en: The task force I'm in is authorized to stop trucks as part of a joint sting op with Narcotics. That sounds unconventional.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们部门有权临时查车跟缉毒部门的联合执法。这不太合常规。

yingyinNormal.en: Start anywhere you like. Take your time, 007, but in five minutes the head of the Joint Security Service is going to walk through that door.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想从哪说起，慢慢来，007，但再过五分钟，联合安全部的主管就会走进来。

yingyinNormal.en: Our delegation to the Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade was unfairly accused and defamed by representatives of the United States government.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们派往商贸联合委员会的代表遭到了美国政府代表的不公平指控与污蔑。

yingyinNormal.en: Chinese don't like surprises. All I'm proposing is that we use the Joint Commission talks to bring it up gently now, set the stage for the next round.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国人不喜欢意外，我只是想说，我们现在利用商贸联委会谈判委婉地提出这个问题，为下轮谈判做好铺垫。

yingyinNormal.en: That's why, on Monday, I'll be visiting our troops at Joint Base McGuire-Dix-Lakehurst in New Jersey to salute them for their service and thank them for their sacrifices.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也因此，在周一，我们将前往新泽西州慰问我们的军人，在麦奎尔-迪克斯-莱克赫斯特联合基地为他们的服务向他们致敬，感谢他们所做的牺牲。

yingyinNormal.en: You see more cross-cultural exchange now, more interest in China, definitely a lot of joint ventures, a lot of co-productions in recent years. Iron Man 3, Transformers 53, Resident Evil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你现在能看到更多跨文化交流了，更多人在中国投股，显然有了更多合资企业，近年来，更多的合作产品，钢铁侠3，变形金刚53，生化危机。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: That's because Congress has always envisioned <highlight>joint</highlight> federal-state immigration enforcement and explicitly encourages state officers to share information and cooperate with federal colleagues.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为，国会一直希望联邦政府和州政府联合执行移民法律，并明确鼓励州政府官员与联邦政府的同僚们共享信息并开展合作。

a structure in the human or animal body at which two parts of the skeleton are fitted together

word_usage.usage:
joint作形容词，意为“联合的；共同的”，如：
a joint account   联合账户 
joint authors  合著者
